FAQs about hotels near 48342

What are the top rated hotels near 48342?

Oakwood River Oaks North, Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Auburn Hills, an IHG Hotel and Troy Inn & Suites are the best rated hotels based on customer reviews in the last 365 days.

What are the upper-end hotels near 48342?

Embassy Suites by Hilton Auburn Hills, Auburn Hills Marriott Pontiac and The Kingsley Bloomfield Hills - a DoubleTree by Hilton are the top 3 luxury hotels near 48342.

What hotels are closest to the area of 48342?

Extended Stay America Suites Detroit Auburn Hills Feathersto, Sonesta Es Suites Auburn Hills Detroit, and Holiday Inn Express Auburn Hills South An Ihg Hotel are the properties closest to 48342.

How much does a cheap hotel near 48342 cost per night?

In the last year, a 2 star hotel near 48342 can be as cheap as $91.85 per night. (based on HotelPlanner prices)

How much does a 3 star hotel near 48342 cost per night?

In the last year, the average 3 star hotel near 48342 has been $120.64 per night. (based on HotelPlanner prices)

How much does a higher-end hotel near 48342 cost?

In the last year, the average 4 star hotel near 48342 has been $121.94 per night. (based on HotelPlanner prices)

What are the most popular independent hotels near 48342?

Oakwood River Oaks North, Troy Inn & Suites and The Townsend Hotel are the best rated independent hotels (not part of a big brand).

What are the most popular Marriott hotels near 48342?

Residence Inn by Marriott Detroit Pontiac Auburn Hills, Courtyard by Marriott Detroit Pontiac and Auburn Hills Marriott Pontiac are the best rated Marriott/Starwood branded hotels (based on customer reviews score).

What are the most popular Choice Hotels branded hotels near 48342?

Mainstay Suites Detroit Auburn Hills, Quality Inn and Comfort Inn Detroit - Troy are the best rated Choice Hotels branded hotels (based on HotelPlanner reviews score).

What are the best IHG hotels near 48342?

Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Auburn Hills, an IHG Hotel, Holiday Inn Express Auburn Hills South An Ihg Hotel and Staybridge Suites Auburn Hills An Ihg Hotel are the best rated Intercontinental Hotel Group (IHG) branded hotels (based on user reviews score).
